class.name: SamplingEntity
class.comment: Storage of the Description of a sampling that was performed in a measuring program.

column.name: fk_measuring_program_id
column.comment: Reference to the measuring program to which this sampling belongs.

column.name: identifier
column.comment: The identifier of the sampling. Should be a URI, UUID. E.g. http://www.example.org/123, 123-321

column.name: name
column.comment: The human readable name or the label of the sampling.

column.name: description
column.comment: A short description or the COMMENT of the sampling

column.name: sampler
column.comment: The sampler (e.g. name of a person or an organization) who take the sample.

column.name: sampling_method
column.comment: The sampling method used to take the sample

column.name: environmental_conditions
column.comment: The environmental conditions when the sample was made, e.g. sunny, dry, hot

column.name: sampling_time_start
column.comment: The timestamp when the sampling period has started.

column.name: sampling_time_end
column.comment: The timestamp when the sampling period has finished.

set.name: datasets
set.comment: Storage of relations between datasets and related samplings

column.name: fk_sampling_id
column.comment: The reference to the sampling in the sampling table.

column.name: fk_dataset_id
column.comment: The reference to the dataset in the dataset table that provides observations related to the sampling.

column.name: fk_sampling_id
column.comment: Reference to the sampling table this internationalization belongs to.

column.name: locale
column.comment: Locale/language specification for this entry. ISO 639 Codes (http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php)

column.name: name
column.comment: Locale/language specific name of the sampling entity

column.name: description
column.comment: Locale/language specific description of the sampling entity

column.name: sampling_method
column.comment: Locale/language specific sampling method of the sampling entity

column.name: environmental_conditions
column.comment: Locale/language specific environmental conditions of the sampling entity
